title: Gears of Desire
description: Steampunk literature abounds everywhere these days, all full of adventures, battles, exploration & invention -- but where is the SEX? It can now be found in "Gears Of Desire", a modest collection of pornographic short-stories, depicting the erotic hijinx of the alterna-Victorian reality. From high gentry to common servant, find out how they get their jollies, in graphic detail!
author: Storm Ryder
